name: Invalid Directory
description:
Invalid Directory is a short Indie Rpg/Fps where you awake to find yourself lost inside an unstable computer. The wind is howling, glitches are hunting you down, and time is running out. Traverse the sandy dunes, ward off dangerous glitches, and figure out how to escape this perilous wasteland.

Oh, and one more thing, Do Not Trust Its Words…

Taking longer than I hoped, Invalid Directory is actually the first game I'm releasing to the public, so I'm rather nervous what everyone thinks about it.

Nonetheless, I hope you enjoy!
